CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: toxic gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent, nerve agent, harmful to most complex forms of organic life.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: rage gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent, specialized airborne agent that induces blind, uncontrollable rage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: tear gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent, specialized airborne agent that attacks the sensitive membranes of the eyes and nose, making it difficult to see or breathe.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: fear gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent, specialized airborne agent that induces an extremely strong feeling of dread and terror.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: sleeping gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains a potent sedative, capable of quickly knocking unconscious anyone exposed to it.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: acid
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains an extremely strong acid, capable of quickly burning away flesh and metal alike.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Nanomachines
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell contains nanomachines designed to latch onto and wreck havoc on the systems of mechanoids. Ineffective against organic life.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Insecticide
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: This shell is filled with a special aerosol specially designed to kill insectoids.
